sub_topic: Probability of a certain weather event occurring
message_1: A city has a 30% chance of rain on any given day. If the city has experienced rain for the past two days, what is the probability that it will rain again tomorrow?
message_2: The probability of rain on any given day is independent of whether it rained the previous days. Therefore, the probability that it will rain again tomorrow is still 30% or 0.3.
